articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Rory McIlroy finds his groove on front nine to stay firmly in the mix at US Open - The Guardian
articles.description: The Northern Irishman is well placed to challenge for a fifth major title after recovering from a tricky start to his second round at LA Country Club
articles.content: In late May, Rory McIlroy departed Oak Hill and the US PGA Championship having conceded he arrived at the major carrying little hope of success. This was quite an admission from an individual who has… [+8513 chars]
